Room.Name: Dark Staircase
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a dark staircase that apparently goes deep into the depths of the Citadel. The winding staircase takes you about three meters down.
Room.LongDescription: You can easily make out the stairs with the light you have generated, but the ground is very slippery. It appears to be covered with moss and other slime. The ornate staircase reveals nothing about the upper or lower realms you are venturing into except for the incredible detail of which the staircase is crafted.
